backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing sessions, outputs, and layers with CRUD operations and simple state tracking for active streams.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata listing feature requirements, related files, components, and confidence for multiple frontend enhancements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of many frontend source files for build and documentation reference.
frontend/index.css: Empty stylesheet placeholder for global styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML page loading the React app via main.tsx with a root container.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with routes for sessions list and session detail pages.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Defines the global layout with header navigation, main content outlet, and footer branding.
frontend/src/components/LayersPanel.tsx: UI panel for listing and adding stream overlay layers with loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/OutputsList.tsx: Displays streaming outputs with copy-to-clipboard actions and error/loading handling.
frontend/src/components/PlatformTargetFo: Form for selecting a streaming platform, validating fields, and submitting output target configuration to a session.
frontend/src/components/QuickStartDialog: Multi‑step dialog for quickly creating a session, selecting video source, and configuring an output platform, with preset import support.
frontend/src/components/SessionForm.tsx: Simple form to create a new session by entering a title and triggering the createSession mutation.
frontend/src/components/StreamHealthPane: Displays stream readiness checks, network information, and YouTube verification state for a session.
Static alert explaining stream‑key storage and recommending extra security for production.
frontend/src/components/VideoSourcePanel: Panel for viewing, editing, and saving a session’s video source URL with Google Drive warnings when applicable.
frontend/src/features/sessions/api.ts: Thin wrappers around backend actor methods for sessions, outputs, video sources, and layers.
frontend/src/features/sessions/mutations: React Query mutations for creating, starting, stopping sessions, adding outputs, and setting video sources with toast feedback and cache updates.
frontend/src/features/sessions/queries.t: Defines React Query hooks to fetch sessions, outputs, and layers from the backend actor, including batch queries and active session listing.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on the user's identity and invalidates related queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, handles login and identity restoration, and manages AuthClient configuration.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining light/dark theme CSS variables and global styles.
frontend/src/lib/fireplaceTitles.ts: Generates random fireplace-themed session titles using adjective, noun, and time lists.
frontend/src/lib/googleDriveLinks.ts: Detects Google Drive share links and provides guidance on required sharing permissions.
frontend/src/lib/presetImport.ts: Parses Google-Docs-style preset text blocks into structured stream presets and reports formatting errors.
frontend/src/lib/quickStartStorage.ts: Stores and retrieves last-used session title and video URL in local storage for quick-start workflows.
frontend/src/lib/youtubeVerificationStor: Manages per-session YouTube verification data in local storage, including status and timestamps.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/SessionDetailPage.tsx: Displays session details, allows starting/stopping streams, and shows panels for outputs, video source, layers, and stream health.
frontend/src/pages/SessionsPage.tsx: Renders the sessions list with loading/error states and dialogs for creating or quick-starting streaming sessions.
frontend/src/platforms/registry.ts: Implements a registry storing platform adapters and exposes lookup and enumeration helpers.
frontend/src/platforms/types.ts: Defines types for platform adapters, platform fields, and validation results.
frontend/src/platforms/validation.ts: Validates platform field values against adapter rules, including required checks and basic URL/number validation.
frontend/src/platforms/youtubeAdapter.ts: Provides the YouTube platform adapter with required RTMP fields and defaults.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, animations, and plugins for the frontend UI.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s high-level goals, architecture notes, features, and versioned state.
